title: Hand Pulled Noodles: A Foolproof Method for STRETCHY Dough
description:
It took me years to finally discover the secret to hand pulled noodles. This is my foolproof dough recipe, now we can finally start practicing and become noodle masters! 

‚ñ∫ Credits to Will Lee for his amazing noodle pulling footage
https://youtu.be/2H-b1ZAMv44

https://goo.gl/sE392P

https://www.patreon.com/mynameisandong

‚ñ∫ My Cutting Board
Frankfurter Brett: http://bit.ly/30dIcFN *
Use the code "MYNAMEISANDONG" in their store to get free shipping!

* This is an affiliate link. I will receive a provision of a possible sale (at no extra charge to you). This helps me keep the channel running.

‚ñ∫ My Asian Grocery Store
I get all of my asian ingredients from go asia. They have stores all over Germany and I genuinely love to shop there. They kindly support the channel by supplying me with some free ingredients (I am not getting paid), thanks!

‚ñ∫ Hand Pulled Noodles - Dough Recipe üçú

500g wheat flour, ideally high gluten (I used12%)
5g salt
250g water (tap water in Berlin is slightly higher in pH)

rest overnight

optional:
3.5g lye water (kansui), OR
1tsp baked baking soda (üá©üá™=Natron, gebacken), dissolved in a teaspoon of water OR
1tsp potash, dissolved in a teaspoon of water


‚ñ∫ MY NAME IS ANDONG 
Food is so powerful in bringing cultures together - something I learned when I lived in China. So let's travel, eat, cook, and learn from each other! I am a filmmaker from Berlin, Germany and make weekly videos about cooking and food culture.
